domain.board.contracts

Interface IBoard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDeepClonable<IBoard>, IReadOnlyBoard
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Board

    public interface IBoard
extends IReadOnlyBoard
    Represents the board this Game is played on. Every board has a number of ISquares which can contain IPieces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Remove an IPiece from the given Location.
